attributes.action: Instigate an Immediate Police Fraud and Prosecution of Members of Parliament Fraudulent Expenses Claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instigate an immediate Police investigation, and where appropriate, a prosecution, into fraudulent expenses claims by Members of Parliament. Members found guilty to be deselected and stripped of all Parliamentary rights and to refund the public funds or have their assets removed accordingly.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
